channel.title: Generals on Hamid' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Generals on Hamid' blog

item.title: Springtime
item.description: I’m glad that springtimeis coming. Spring is good and refreshing. I believe everything about it is very standard and normal. Although Summer is still my favorite season, Spring is the second one. And there is one small reason for it called “Hope”. I feel It’s like the planet wakes up after weeks of hard and cold days. And you can see it’s still hopeful, green and fresh! Also, Spring is the start of a new Iranian year.

item.title: Hi
item.description: Hi, Welcome to my blog. Enjoy the silence in this empty and quiet post until I share more thoughts! :)
